content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_slab
inventory=[{"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 2, "index": 14}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "husk_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 19}, {"type": "loom", "quantity": 14, "index": 20}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 36, "index": 23}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 58, "index": 28}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 24, "index": 36}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 30, "index": 39}]

thought: To craft jungle_slabs, I need to first craft jungle_planks. The only jungle_planks recipe available to me requires a stripped_jungle_wood which I have in slot 34. Therefore I will move the stripped_jungle_wood to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_slab
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 2, "index": 14}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "husk_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 19}, {"type": "loom", "quantity": 14, "index": 20}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 36, "index": 23}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 58, "index": 28}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 24, "index": 36}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 30, "index": 39}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the jungle_planks, I will move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11) so that I can use the crafting grid again.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_slab
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 2, "index": 14}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "husk_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 19}, {"type": "loom", "quantity": 14, "index": 20}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 36, "index": 23}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 58, "index": 28}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 24, "index": 36}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 30, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft a jungle_slab, I need to place three jungle_planks in a row in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move one of the planks from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_slab
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 2, "index": 14}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "husk_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 19}, {"type": "loom", "quantity": 14, "index": 20}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 36, "index": 23}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 58, "index": 28}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 24, "index": 36}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 30, "index": 39}]
thought: Since there is already a plank in slot 1, I will move another plank to the right of it (slot 2)
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_slab
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 2, "index": 14}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "husk_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 19}, {"type": "loom", "quantity": 14, "index": 20}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 36, "index": 23}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 58, "index": 28}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 24, "index": 36}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 30, "index": 39}]
thought: I have two planks in the crafting grid, so I will move the third plank to the right of the second plank (slot 3).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_slab
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 2, "index": 14}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "husk_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 19}, {"type": "loom", "quantity": 14, "index": 20}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 36, "index": 23}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 58, "index": 28}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 24, "index": 36}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 30, "index": 39}]
thought: The jungle_slabs have been crafted, so I will move them from the crafting slot (0) to an empty inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 6
